Posts.Content: My husband's last PSA was 154 and his prostate is very large. He had a biopsy which came back negative. In a few weeks he will have an MRI of the prostate. Wondering if anyone has had anything similar?
Posts.Title: Enlarged prostate with negative biopsy

Posts.Content: Hi Chuck and thanks for your reply. All of my husband's blood work is negative for an infection. He is 77 years old. He is on Plavix and Xarelto after a stroke 3 years ago. He had major complications with bleeding after the biopsy, 5 ER visits and two hospitalizations in 3 weeks. For now everything is quiet. He has lost about 10 lbs in the last 6 months and his energy level is very low.
Posts.Title: Enlarged prostate with negative biopsy
